search via text box; exact match only
search via text box; exact match only
search via numerical range; values with uncertainty have square brackets, e.g., [1990,1996]; genomes with unknown year have "Unknown"; users often want to exclude "Unknown"

search via drop down menu, check box, or similar; one of "Africa", "Antarctica", "Asia", "Europe", "North America", "Ocean", "Oceania", "Other", "South America", or "Unknown"; users often want to exclude genomes with "Unknown"
search via text box; exact match only; could also possibly search via drop down menu; genomes with unknown country have "Unknown"; users often want to exclude "Unknown"
search via text box; exact match only; genomes with unknown region have "Unknown"; users may want to exclude "Unknown"
search via text box; exact match only; alternatively, may want to search via drop down menu; genomes with unknown country code have "Unknown"; users often want to exclude "Unknown"
search via text box; exact match only; genomes with unknown region code have "Unknown"; users may want to exclude "Unknown"

search via drop down menu, check box, or similar; one of "Animal_Mammal", "Animal_Other", "Animal_Unspecified", "Biocontrol_Agent", "Consumer_Product", "Environmental", "Food", "Human", "Laboratory", or "Unknown"; users often want to exclude genomes with "Unknown" and/or "Laboratory"

search via drop down menu, check box, or similar; one of "Animal_Mammal:Clinical", "Animal_Mammal:Non-Clinical", "Animal_Mammal:Unspecified", "Animal_Other", "Animal_Unspecified", "Biocontrol_Agent", "Consumer_Product", "Environmental", "Food", "Human:Clinical", "Human:Non-Clinical", "Human:Unspecified", "Laboratory", or "Unknown"; users often want to exclude genomes with "Unknown" and/or "Laboratory"

search via drop down menu, check box, or similar; one of "Anthrax", "Foodborne_Illness:Diarrheal", "Foodborne_Illness:Emetic", "Foodborne_Illness:Unspecified", "Other", or "Unknown"; users may want to exclude genomes with "Unknown"
search via drop down menu with either "Unknown" or "Not Unknown" (excludes genomes with "Unknown" and takes everything else)
search via text box; exact match only; alternatively, can use drop down menu or something similar
search via numerical range; users usually want to find values greater than or equal to a specific value, e.g., >= 95
search via numerical range; users usually want to find values less than or equal to a specific value, e.g., <= 5
search via numerical range; users usually want to find values less than or equal to a specific value, e.g., <= 1000
search via numerical range; users usually want to find values greater than or equal to a specific value, e.g., >= 100000
searchable column for "BTyper3_species(ANI)"; can use a drop down menu or something similar
searchable column for "BTyper3_subspecies(ANI)"; can use a drop down menu or something similar
searchable column for "BTyper3_Pseudo_Gene_Flow_Unit(ANI)"; can use a drop down menu or something similar
searchable column for "BTyper3_Closest_Type_Strain(ANI)"; can use a drop down menu or something similar
searchable column for "BTyper3_anthrax_toxin(genes)"; search via numerical range; users will likely want to find genomes with exactly 0 or 3 genes, or with >= 2 genes
searchable column for "BTyper3_emetic_toxin_cereulide(genes)"; search via numerical range; users will likely want to find genomes with exactly 0 or 4 genes, or with >= 2 genes
searchable column for "BTyper3_diarrheal_toxin_Nhe(genes)"; search via numerical range; users will likely want to find genomes with exactly 0 or 3 genes, or with >= 1 gene
searchable column for "BTyper3_diarrheal_toxin_Hbl(genes)"; search via numerical range; users will likely want to find genomes with exactly 0 or 4 genes, or with >= 1 gene
searchable column for "BTyper3_diarrheal_toxin_CytK(top_hit)"; search via drop down menu or something similar; can be "cytK-1", "cytK-2", or "Absent"
searchable column for "BTyper3_sphingomyelinase_Sph(gene)"; search via drop down menu or something similar; can be "Present" or "Absent"
searchable column for "BTyper3_capsule_Cap(genes)"; search via numerical range; users will likely want to find genomes with exactly 0 or 5 genes, or with >= 3 genes
searchable column for "BTyper3_capsule_Has(genes)"; search via numerical range; users will likely want to find genomes with exactly 0 or 3 genes, or with >= 2 genes
searchable column for "BTyper3_capsule_Bps(genes)"; search via numerical range; users will likely want to find genomes with exactly 0 or 9 genes, or with >=4 genes
searchable column for "BTyper3_Bt(genes)"; search via drop down menu or similar; can be "Present or Absent"
searchable column for "BTyper3_PubMLST_ST[clonal_complex](perfect_matches)"; search via text box; exact matches only
searchable column for "BTyper3_Adjusted_panC_Group(predicted_species)"; search via drop down menu or something similar
